text: Manganese(III) oxide is a chemical compound. It has manganese in its +3 oxidation state. Its chemical formula is Mn2O3. It is a brown or black solid. It is made by heating manganese(IV) oxide to a temperature lower than . It is made in an alkaline cell when it dies. ==Related pages== *Manganese(II) oxide *Manganese(II) chloride *Manganese(VII) oxide Category:Manganese compounds Category:Oxides
title: Manganese(III) oxide
